Ingredients.9: 1 to taste salt and pepper to taste

Ingredients.11: 1 (9 inch) frozen prepared pie crust, thawed

Directions.1: Wash chicken breasts in water and then place in a pot with water just to cover the chicken add some salt and pepper and garlic powder. Bring to a boil, turn off heat and cover. Let cool in the pot.

Directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.3: Wash and cut potatoes into bite size pieces and boil till almost fork tender. Drain and set aside.

Directions.4: Wash celery and cut to bite-size pieces. Cut onion to bite-size pieces.

Directions.5: In a large heavy skillet, over medium heat, saute celery and onion with 2 tablespoons oil, for 5 to 8 minutes. Add the frozen vegetables and cook another 5 minutes. Add flour and cook about 30 seconds.

Directions.6: Add chicken broth and bring to a boil. After it has become thick, add potatoes.

Directions.7: Remove chicken from pot and cut into bite-size pieces and add to vegetable mixture. Add salt and pepper to taste.

Directions.8: Pour mixture into a 9 inch deep dish pie plate and cover with pie shell. Make sure you crimp the edges of the pie shell to the plate so no juices spill in oven.

Directions.9: Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 45 minutes or until pie shell is cooked and golden brown.
